name: modularized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
designed or produced in separate pieces or parts: a modularized chassis design Products and services become increasingly modularized.
education
  UK specialized (of an educational course or its content) designed as a series of modules (= separate units) that can be combined in different ways: The modularised and portable digital content can be used in educational settings. The current academic year has seen the first year of fully modularized courses at the university. See
modularize
More examplesFewer examplesBy building modularized products, supply chains become more responsive.Projects can be modularized and standardized to reduce expenses and time.modularised distance-learning materials with computer-marked assessment
